### Steps to reproduce

 or describe where the problem is otherwise)

#### Expected behaviour

(Describe what you expected to happen)

#### Observed behaviour

(Describe what happened instead)

### Environment

(Describe the environment where the problem happens. This usually includes:

  - OS
  - JavaScript VM
  - Folktale version
)
